Text.Page:
The gulas trapped us...it was horrible. There were eight of us...an empty room.

Then seven, then six...

They're all watching me. But I don't want to die! No!

He's a mess, and he's not the only one. My...paramour, I guess you'd say...was one of the eight. And that's why I'd like to see him recover. Or at least become coherent.

He might know where Nilos is. I'm no soldier, but I can heal woundsâ€”even the sort of wounds he has.

While I'm doing that, you should be fighting the monsters in that maze. For me, for him, for Nilos. For all of us!
